\begin{eqnarray} %\label{ct99-3}
N(\omega) & = & \frac{1}{\hbar ^2}\int d\sigma \int d\tau |\langle 1_{\vec{k}}, \epsilon ^{'}|H_{\rm int}|\epsilon, 0\rangle|^{2}\nonumber\\
& = &\frac{e^2}{\hbar ^2}\sum _{i,j}^{3}\int d\sigma \int d\tau e^{-i\omega \tau}\langle x_i(\sigma) x_{j}(\sigma)\rangle 
\,\langle E_{i}(\sigma _{-})
E_{j}(\sigma _{+})\rangle ~,
\
